description:
Ours is a big, open, and clean apartment in the heart of Williamsburg, Brooklyn. It's perfect for groups of friends or couples that are looking for a home base for their NYC vacation.  

The apartment is located 3 blocks (re three normal, clean, and responsive, Ivy league graduates (please excuse the last part, some people seem to care). If you need anything, just ask!

Thanks again for considering our place. Please reach out if you have any questions whatsoever.

We hope to see you soon!
name: Spacious Williamsburg 3br w/ Skyline View!
review: Brett was really kind Brett's house was very comfortable! It is located near the station and shops or restaurants. Also, we could see beautiful night view of Manhattan.
